audio.addAudioAltHeader: Add image description for the visually impaired

dubbing.infoAutomatic: The learner will benefit from an automatic voice dubbing of the text of this activity.
dubbing.infoText: The learner will have a voice-over generated from the text below for this activity.
dubbing.title: Dubbing of the activity text

image.a11yModalHeader: Add image description for the visually impaired

descriptionActivities.LOGO: Highlight your brand, by uploading or dropping your logo very easily! We advise you to use it at the start of the course.
descriptionActivities.MCQ: Assess your learners with single-choice or multiple-choice questions, in the form of texts!
descriptionActivities.MCQ_IMAGE: Assess your learners with single or multiple choice questions, in the form of pictures!
descriptionActivities.IMAGE_AND_TEXT: Present an image and a text, including all the animation options of a “Text” activity in order to optimize the understanding of your learners!
descriptionActivities.DOCUMENT: Make additional resources available to the module, in any format (document, spreadsheet, image, etc.). These files will be downloadable by your learners.
descriptionActivities.MCQ_AUDIO: Assess your learners with single-choice or multiple-choice questions, in the form of audios!
descriptionActivities.VIDEO: Broadcast video content, by importing a file or by a Youtube or Vimeo link!
descriptionActivities.TEXT: Animate your texts (highlighted, underlined, crossed out and add definition): the key elements will be highlighted and the complex concepts better understood thanks to animations that are built over the reading.
descriptionActivities.SORTING: Assess your learners with an exercise in ranking the answers in the right order! The answers can be in any format (text, audio or image) in the same question.
descriptionActivities.MATCHING: Match the correct pairs. Responses can be in text, audio or image format.
descriptionActivities.ADAPTIVE_CARDS: Assess your learners with card lists that scale based on the number of correct answers per list. Cards can be in any format (text, audio or image).
descriptionActivities.HOT_SPOT: Highlight points of interest on an image in a certain order! Each point may refer to text, image, video or sound.
descriptionActivities.HOT_SPOT_QUESTION: Evaluate your learners from an image! Each point represents a possible answer and may refer to text, image, video or sound when correcting the activity.
